display_mode.label: Display style of multiple notice boards

show_social_media.label: Display social media icon
show_social_media.info: If the notice board layout is set as compact/tiled, the social media will not be displayed all the time

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

slice_in_pc.label: Slide horizontally to view on PC

slice_in_mobile.label: Enable horizontal scroll to view all

slice_in_pc.label: Slide horizontally to view on PC

slice_in_mobile.label: Enable horizontal scroll to view all

button_text.label: Button text
button_text.info: Display this button only if "Maximum product quantity" is less than the product quantity under this category

button_follow_endof_list.label: Display View more button on mobile device at the end of list

product_hover_show_next.label: Display next product image when mouse hovers over the screen

line_through_style.label: Display strikethrough when out of stock/deleting SKU
line_through_style.info: When out of stock or SKU is deleted, the option can be selected, and the add-to-cart button will be grayed out.

is_show_stock_hint.label: Display quantity prompt when inventory is at low level
is_show_stock_hint.info: Display inventory quantity below the quantity selector when inventory is less than 10 pieces

btnText.label: Button text

cutline_style.label: Dividing line style on mobile device

subscribe_letter_placeholder.label: Prompt text in the input box

show_locale_selector.label: Display the language selector
show_locale_selector.info: You need to go to Market - Language management and add at least two items of the language to make selector effective. To add the language, you can go to [Language setting](/admin/settings/lang), then go to [Market](/admin/settings/markets) - Language management page once it is completed and add the multilanguage of current market

show_country_selector.label: Display country selector
show_country_selector.info: You need to add at least two market items to make "Display country selector" effective. To add a market, please go to [Market setting](/admin/settings/markets)

options__0.label: At the top of copyright text

main_menu_link_list_effect.label: Dynamic drop-down effects of navigation menu

options__1.label: LOGO at the left, menu in a new line

mobile_top_menu.label: Pin-to-top menu on mobile device
mobile_top_menu.info: When configured, the menu will be fixed at the bottom of header on mobile device, and it can be switched through horizontal slides

mobile_top_menu_show_home.label: Menu pinned to top will only be displayed on home page
mobile_top_menu_show_home.info: When configured, the menu pinned to top will only be displayed on the home page

user_mobile_layout.label: Personal center position on mobile device

sticky_collection.label: Transparent header for category page
sticky_collection.info: Effective once the cover of collection page is configured

show_line_separator.label: Display divider when breaking lines of menu

suggested_menu.label: Suggested search content
suggested_menu.info: Once selected, this menu will appear in search bar as a suggestion when customers search for the first time

hover_show_user_menu.label: Display the drop-down box by hovering on the personal center icon on PC

show_locale_selector.label: Display the language selector
show_locale_selector.info: You need to go to Market - Language management and add at least two items of the language to make selector effective. To add the language, you can go to [Language setting](/admin/settings/lang), then go to [Market](/admin/settings/markets) - Language management page once it is completed and add the multilanguage of current market

show_country_selector.label: Display country selector
show_country_selector.info: You need to add at least two market items to make "Display country selector" effective. To add a market, please go to [Market setting](/admin/settings/markets)
